summary: An Ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 15th Avenue West, from West Nickerson Street to Elliott Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7057, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
